title.en: Merched y Wawr Llanfarian Branch's First Photograph 1971
title.cy: Llun cyntaf Merched y Wawr Llanfarian 1971

description.en:
Llun cyntaf Merched y Wawr Llanfarian yn Ysgoldy Bont, Llanfarian, Ebrill 21, 1971.
Ffurfiwyd y gangen ar Ionawr 19, 1969.
Rhes gefn – Beti Jones, Phillys Bowen, Prescilla Evans, Hefina Davies, Beti Wyn Emanuel, Beryl Davies, Valmair Davies, Margaret Griffiths, Eirian Rowlands, Ruth Morris, Beti Evans, Bet Jones, Hilda Evans
Rhes ganol – Sally Lewis, Gini Davies, Elizabeth Thomas, Megan Williams, Betty Williams, Nansi Jones, Sal Evans, Doris Edwards, Doris Williamson, Bronwen Jones, Sal Owen, Blodwen Hughes, Janet James
Rhes flaen – Iona Mason, Mary Parry, Mary Jones, Nita Thomas, Dilys Thomasm Menna Davies, Elizabeth Evans, Nesta Edwards, Mary Morris, Gwen James, Marged James, Beti Jones
